spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The abhorrent overlord's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Insatiable Greed
entries: The abhorrent overlord can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The abhorrent overlord té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abhorrent overlord fa dos atacs with its claws.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic. The abhorrent overlord regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt if the target is a creature.

action.name: Storm of Crows {@recharge}
entries: The abhorrent overlord conjures a swarm of spectral crows and harpies in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the overlord can see within 120 feet of it. The sphere remains for 1 minute or until the overlord loses concentration (as if concentrating on a spell), and its area is lightly obscured and terreny difícil.

Any creature that moves into the area per primer cop en un torn o hi començi el torn ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. A creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany tallant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: D'Ací no Passen
entries: While the hoplite is holding a spear, other creatures provoke an opportunity attack from the hoplite when they move within 5 feet of it. When the hoplite hits a creature with an opportunity attack using its spear, the creature takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant, and the creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hoplite makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The alseid's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: The alseid has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide while it is in grassland.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The alseid té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The alseid makes two radiant touch attacks.

action.name: Radiant Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany radiant.

monster.name: Anvilwrought Raptor
idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The raptor has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Recorded Mimicry
entries: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The raptor fa dos atacs with its beak.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Anvilwrought Raptor Familiar
entries: Some anvilwrought raptors are created expressly to be familiars. Such creatures have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The anvilwrought can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magical, telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the anvilwrought senses, as long as they are within 1 mile of each other.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si Aphemia falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Aphemia té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Aphemia fa dos atacs: one with her bite and one with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Discordant Song
entries: Aphemia shrieks a cacophony of magical sounds. Each humanoid within 120 feet of her ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition acovardit} of her until the song ends. A {@condition acovardit} creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany psíquic at the start of its turn while Aphemia is singing. Una criatura {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to Aphemia's Discordant Song durant les properes 24 hores. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is {@condition incapacitat} or dies.

action.name: Grave Calling Song
entries: Aphemia intones a low, growling magical melody. Every undead within 300 feet of her ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or fall under her control until the song ends. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing, and she can mentally command the undead under her control as part of the same bonus action. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is {@condition incapacitat} or dies.

monster.name: Arasta

trait.name: Armor of Spiders (Mythic Trait; es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: If Arasta es queda a 0 punts de vida, she doesn't die or fall {@condition inconscient}. Instead, she regains 200 hit points. A més, Arasta's children immediately swarm over her body to protect her, granting her 100 punts de vida temporals.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Arasta falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Arasta té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: Arasta pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Arasta ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Arasta fa tres atacs: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21}. Qui falli rep 32 ({@damage 5d12}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. If the damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora, even after regaining hit points, i està {@condition paralitzat} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Web of Hair {@recharge 4}
entries: Arasta unleashes her hair in the form of webbing that fills a 30-foot cube next to her. The web is terreny difícil, its area is lightly obscured, and it dura 1 minut. Any creature that moves into the web or that starts its turn there ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition restrained} while in the web. A creature can use an action to make a {@dc 21} Força check. On a success, it can free itself or a creature within 5 feet of it that is {@condition restrained} by the web. This webbing is immune to all damage except magical fire. A 5-foot cube of the web is destroyed if it takes at least 20 fire damage from a spell or other magical source on a single turn.

legendary.name: Urpes
entries: Arasta makes one attack with her claws.

legendary.name: Swarm (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Arasta causes two {@creature swarm of spiders||swarms of spiders} to appear in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of her.

legendary.name: Toxic Web (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each creature {@condition restrained} by Arasta's Web of Hair takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí.

mythicHeader: If Arasta's mythic trait is active, she can use the options below as legendary actions, as long as she has punts de vida temporals from her Armor of Spiders.

mythic.name: Swipe
entries: Arasta fa dos atacs with her claws.

mythic.name: Web of Hair (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Arasta recharges Web of Hair and uses it.

mythic.name: Nyx Weave (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature {@condition restrained} by Arasta's Web of Hair ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21}, or the creature takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de força and any spell of 6th level or lower on it ends.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The archon's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The archon pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The archon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Muntura
entries: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not {@condition incapacitat}, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Destresa saving throws. If the archon es queda a 0 punts de vida while riding its mount, the mount es queda a 0 punts de vida as well.

trait.name: Radiant Rebirth (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: If the archon es queda a 0 punts de vida, it regains 30 hit points and springs back to its feet with a burst of radiance. Each creature of the archon's choice within 30 feet of ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}, or the creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany radiant i està {@condition encegat} until the start of the archon's turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The archon fa dos atacs with its radiant spear.

action.name: Radiant Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany radiant.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The archon makes a radiant spear attack or casts sageta guia.

legendary.name: Coordinated Assault (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The archon makes a radiant spear attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a atac armat cos a cos.

legendary.name: Return to Nyx (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The archon causes a corpse it can see within 30 feet of it to burst into a shower of radiant stars leaving no trace of it behind. Everything it is wearing or carrying remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the corpse when it bursts ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16} or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany radiant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The ashen rider's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 18} salvació de conjur). The rider pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Aura de Silenci
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the ashen rider, the rider can force that creature to make a {@dc 18} Saviesa saving throw if the rider can see it. Si supera, the creature is immune to this aura durant les properes 24 hores. Si falla, the creature can't speak i està {@condition eixordat} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Muntura
entries: If the ashen rider isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the ashen rider and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the ashen rider appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying.

While mounted and not {@condition incapacitat}, the ashen rider can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Destresa saving throws. If the ashen rider es queda a 0 punts de vida while riding its mount, the mount es queda a 0 punts de vida as well.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ashen rider fa tres atacs with its ashen blade or two attacks with its bolt of ash.

action.name: Ashen Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Bolt of Ash
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the ashen rider's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The ashen rider makes an attack using its ashen blade or bolt of ash.

legendary.name: Coordinated Assault (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The ashen rider makes an attack using its ashen blade or bolt of ash, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a atac armat cos a cos.

legendary.name: Reduce to Ash (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The ashen rider targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}, or it takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany necròtic and its punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. If the target's punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0, its body and everything it is wearing and carrying, except for magic items, are reduced to ash. A creature reduced to ash can't be revived by any means short of a {@spell desig} spell.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The harpy té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The harpy té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The harpy makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si Antigonos es mou 10 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un gore, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be pushed fins a 10 peus away and knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Enteniment Laberíntic
entries: Antigonos can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, Antigonos can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls he makes during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Decrepit State
entries: Antigonos has disadvantage on his attack rolls.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Amphora
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. If there is not already a creature inside the amphora, the target is {@condition restrained} inside. Com a acció, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 14} Destresa (Acrobàcies) check, escaping from the amphora on a success. The effect also ends if the amphora is destroyed. The amphora has AC 8, 20 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

monster.name: Bronze Sable
idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si sable es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal statue.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The sable té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de sable's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Atac Sorpresa
entries: Si the sable sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sable makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Burnished Hart
idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the hart moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Escalfor Corporal
entries: A creature that touches the hart or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Cos Estable
entries: The hart has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hart fa dos atacs: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

action.name: Antlers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

monster.name: Colossus of Akros
idiomes: understands Common and Celestial però no pot parlar

trait.name: Crumbling Destruction
entries: When the colossus es queda a 0 punts de vida, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 22}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany contundent and 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the colossus is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The colossus és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The colossus's són màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The colossus fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The colossus of Akros fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, o 200/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) de dany perforant, o 27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos. If the colossus makes a ranged attack with this spear, the spear magically returns to its hand after the attack.

action.name: Espasa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 6d8 + 9}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Flames of Akros {@recharge}
entries: Magical flames issue from the colossus toward up to three creatures the colossus can see within 90 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 24}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Si falla, a target also magically catches fire durant 1 minut. Al final de cada torn seu thereafter, the burning target repeats the saving throw. It takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de foc si falla, and the effect ends on a successful one.

trait.name: Aura of Erebos
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the giant ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}, or it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic and can't regain hit points fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the giant's Aura of Erebos for 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The giant té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Noxious Gust {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant exhala un mighty gust that creates a blast of deadly mist en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 10 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Si falla, rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic i està {@condition enderrocat}. Qui superi en rep la meitat i no està {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Insatiable Greed
entries: The eater of hope can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The eater of hope té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eater of hope fa dos atacs with its claws.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Breath of Hopelessness {@recharge 5}
entries: The eater of hope exhales a miasma of Underworld winds en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 14}. Si falla, rep 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany necròtic and is cursed durant 1 minut. While cursed in this way, the target takes an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany necròtic whenever the eater of hope hits it with an attack. Si supera, l'objectiu rep la meitat del dany and isn't cursed.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The lion té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el lion es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 14}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el lion pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump fins a 25 peus.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: The lion has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the lion (not an area). If the lion's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the lion and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lion fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claw.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Urpa
entries: The lion makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Roar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The lion emits a magical roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the lion that can hear the roar ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition acovardit} of the lion until the end of the lion's next turn.

monster.name: Flitterstep Eidolon
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the eidolon is subjected to an effect that allows it salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, the eidolon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The eidolon pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The eidolon té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eidolon fa dos atacs cos a cos. Immediately before or after one of its attacks, it can use Flitterstep if it is available.

action.name: Flickering Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Flitterstep {@recharge 5}
entries: The eidolon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. If it makes an attack immediately after teleporting, it has advantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Ghostblade Eidolon
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The eidolon pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The eidolon té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eidolon makes two ghostblade attacks.

action.name: Ghostblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de força.

monster.name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the sentinel es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un ram, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: The sentinel has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the sentinel (not an area). If the sentinel's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the sentinel and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sentinel makes two ram attacks.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The sentinel exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hippocamp pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the hippocamp es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un ram, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 12} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The giant can't be surprised.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 21} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

reaction.name: Desviar Atac
entries: The giant adds 5 to its AC against one weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the giant must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Hythonia

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Hythonia's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 18} salvació de conjur). She can innately cast {@spell animar objectes} once per day sense que calguin components materials.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Hythonia falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: When a creature that can see Hythonia's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Hythonia can force it to make a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw if she isn't {@condition incapacitat} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrificat}. Otherwise, on a failed save the creature begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw Al final del seu proper torn, becoming {@condition petrificat} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the restabliment superior spell or other magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Hythonia fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Hythonia in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If Hythonia sees herself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of her and in an area of bright light, she is affected by her own gaze.

trait.name: Shed Skin (Mythic Trait; es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: If Hythonia es queda a 0 punts de vida, she doesn't die or fall {@condition inconscient}. Instead, she sheds her skin, regains 199 hit points, and moves up to her speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Hythonia fa tres atacs: one with her claws, one to constrict, and one with her snaky hair.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and takes 15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany contundent a l'inici de cada torn seu, and Hythonia can't constrict another target.

action.name: Snaky Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5}) de dany contundent, and Hythonia can pull the target fins a 5 peus closer to her if it is a Large or smaller creature.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: Hythonia moves up to her speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

legendary.name: Snaky Hair
entries: Hythonia makes one attack with her snaky hair.

legendary.name: Petrified Earth (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Hythonia causes stone spikes to erupt from the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on her. The area becomes terreny difícil fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. Any creature, other than Hythonia, takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant for every 5 feet it moves on those spikes.

mythicHeader: If Hythonia's mythic trait is active, she can use the options below as legendary actions durant 1 hora after using Shed Skin.

mythic.name: Numbing Claws
entries: Hythonia fa dos atacs with her claws. If both attacks hit the same creature, it takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí and ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 18). Si falla, become paralyzed fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

mythic.name: Look at Me (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Hythonia can force a sighted creature she has {@condition grappled} to see her eyes and be affected by her gaze.

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: When the hidra takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of the hidra takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany d'àcid.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The hidra can hold its breath durant 1 hora.

trait.name: Caps Múltiples
entries: The hidra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hidra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, or knocked {@condition inconscient}. Whenever the hidra takes 35 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hidra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hidra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hidra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hidra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hidra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The lampad's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Corpse Stride
entries: Once on its turn, the lampad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one creature's corpse within its abast and emerge from a second creature's corpse within 60 feet of the first corpse, appearing en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the second corpse. Both corpses must be Medium or bigger.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The lampad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lampad attacks twice with its necrotic touch or mà morta.

action.name: Necrotic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Mà Morta (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the lampad's next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the lampad until the end of the lampad's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The leonin's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

1e: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the leonin is subjected to an effect that allows it salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the leonin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The leonin makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Dard
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The medusa makes either three melee attacks—one with its snake hair, one to constrict, and one with its shortsword—or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

items.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 11} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the medusa can't constrict another target.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The hoplite és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hoplite makes three weapon attacks. It can replace one weapon attack with raig gebre.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Raig gebre (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de fred, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hoplite's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The naiad's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The naiad pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The naiad is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The naiad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The naiad makes two psychic touch attacks.

action.name: Psychic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The shepherd's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 17} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Aura of Nightmares
entries: Undead creatures within 30 feet of the shepherd gain a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls. When any other creature that isn't undead or a construct starts its turn within 30 feet of the shepherd, that creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The shepherd té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The shepherd fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its staff.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans, plus 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Herd the Underworld (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The shepherd pulls twisted souls from the Underworld; {@dice 1d6} {@creature shadow||shadows} (without Sunlight Weakness) arise in unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of the shepherd. The shadows act right after the shepherd on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the shepherd dies.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the ram es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un ram, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ram té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Cos Estable
entries: The ram has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws against effects that would knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de força.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The oracle's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Blessings of the Gods
entries: While the oracle is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier. A més, a creature that hits the oracle with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de força.

action.name: Eldritch Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany de força.

reaction.name: Divine Insight (3/Dia)
entries: When the oracle or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the oracle can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The oread's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Invisible in Fire
entries: The oread is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in fire.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The oread té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The oread attacks twice with its fiery touch or sageta de foc.

action.name: Fiery Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Sageta de Foc (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

reaction.name: Venjança dels Inferns (Conjur de Nivell 2; 1/Dia)
entries: When the oread is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of the oread that it can see, the creature that damaged the oread ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Gatekeeper's Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the phylaskia ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. Si supera, the creature is immune to this aura durant les properes 24 hores. Si falla, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws and its speed is halved fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the phylaskia to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the phylaskia drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The phylaskia can't be surprised.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The phylaskia makes two longsword attacks and uses its Força Drain once.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant, o 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Força Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany necròtic. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, its Força score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Força to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: When Polukranos takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of Polukranos takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Polukranos falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Caps Múltiples
entries: Polukranos has five heads. While it has more than one head, Polukranos has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, or knocked {@condition inconscient}. Whenever Polukranos takes 40 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, Polukranos dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken 40 or more fire damage since its last turn. Polukranos regains 20 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: Polukranos fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While Polukranos sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Polukranos makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 21} or be pushed fins a 20 peus away from Polukranos.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: Polukranos fa una tirada d'habilitat de Saviesa (Percepció).

legendary.name: Cop de Cua
entries: Polukranos fa un atac Cua.

entries: Polukranos moves fins a 50 peus en línia recta and can move through the space of any creature Huge or smaller. The first time it enters each creature's space during this move, it can make a stomp attack against that creature.

entries: The Returned makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

monster.name: Returned Sentry
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The Returned té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de Returned's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The Returned té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

trait.name: Unreadable Face
entries: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Saviesa (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Fona
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Actuació Captivadora
entries: If the sàtir performs durant 1 minut o més, it chooses up to four humanoids within 60 feet of it who watched or listened to the entire performance. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition fascinat}. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the target idolizes the sàtir and will take part in the sàtir's revels. The {@condition fascinat} condition ends for the creature passada 1 hora, if it takes any damage, if the sàtir attacks the target, or if the target witnesses the sàtir attacking or damaging any of the target's allies.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The sàtir té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sleepless Reveler
entries: the sàtir no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sàtir makes two ram attacks or two shortbow attacks.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The sàtir té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sleepless Reveler
entries: the sàtir no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sàtir makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hail of Arrows (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The sàtir fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany perforant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

monster.name: Theran Chimera
idiomes: understands Dracònic però no pot parlar

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The chimera fa tres atacs: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Head
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The chimera exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 32 ({@damage 5d12}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The tritó's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The tritó pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Summon Water Weird (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the tritó magically summons {@dice 1d4} {@creature water weird||water weirds}. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the tritó on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the tritó dies.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tritó fa dos atacs using Wave Touch and casts raig gebre.

action.name: Wave Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Raig gebre (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de fred, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the tritó's next turn.

reaction.name: Frigid Shield
entries: When a creature the tritó can see targets the tritó with an attack, the tritó gains 10 punts de vida temporals. If the attack hits and reduces the punts de vida temporals to 0, each creature within 5 feet of the tritó takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de fred.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The tritó's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The tritó pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: The tritó can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tritó makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.

action.name: Urchin-Spine Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora, even after regaining hit points, i està {@condition paralitzat} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way.

action.name: Poisoned Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

monster.name: Tromokratis

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Tromokratis pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: When Tromokratis es queda a 0 punts de vida, it doesn't die or fall {@condition inconscient}. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Tromokratis falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Tromokratis's són màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: Tromokratis fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
entries: Tromokratis has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against Tromokratis has disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Tromokratis fa tres atacs: one with its pincer, one with its tail, and one with its tentacle grasp.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 26} per escapar). Durant aquesta presa, l'objectiu també està {@condition restrained}, and Tromokratis can't use this attack on anyone else.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Tentacle Grasp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 26} per escapar). If the target doesn't escape by the end of its next turn, Tromokratis throws the target fins a 60 peus en línia recta. The target lands {@condition enderrocat} and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition encegat} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de Tromokratis, i rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de Tromokratis's. Si Tromokratis rep 50 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition enderrocat} a 10 peus d'abast de Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: Tromokratis moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Cua
entries: Tromokratis makes one atac de cua.

legendary.name: Mossegada (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Tromokratis makes one bite attack.

mythicHeader: If Tromokratis's mythic trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions durant 1 hora after using Hearts of the Kraken.

mythic.name: Enfurismar
entries: Tromokratis fa dos atacs: one with its tail and one with its tentacle grasp.

mythic.name: Coral Growth (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of Tromokratis ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 25). Qui falli rep 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany tallant; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, Tromokratis and its hearts gain a +2 bonus to AC.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Multiheaded
entries: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition inconscient}.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The cerberus té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de cerberus's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cerberus makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The cerberus exhales a 15-foot cone of molten rock. Tota criatura a dins del con ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Si falla, a creature is also {@condition restrained} by the hardening rock. A creature can make a {@dc 12} Força (Atletisme) check com a acció, freeing itself or a creature within abast from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The typhon té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The typhon recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The typhon fa tres atacs: one with its Ràfega de Mossegades, one to constrict, and one with its maw.

action.name: Ràfega de Mossegades
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}35 ({@damage 8d6 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and takes 17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany contundent a l'inici de cada torn seu. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.

action.name: Boca
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany d'àcid.

monster.name: Underworld Cerberus
idiomes: understands all languages però no pot parlar

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Multiheaded
entries: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition inconscient}.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The cerberus té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de cerberus's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cerberus makes three bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The cerberus exhales a 30-foot cone of molten rock. Tota criatura a dins del con ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Si falla, a creature is also {@condition restrained} by the hardening rock. A creature can make a {@dc 15} Força (Atletisme) check com a acció, freeing itself or a creature within abast from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 20 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

monster.name: Winged Bull
idiomes: understands Celestial però no pot parlar

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Winged Lion
idiomes: understands Celestial però no pot parlar

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el lion es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 15}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el lion pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The woe strider's open mouth creates an area of antimagic, as in the camp antimàgic spell, en un con de 60 peus. A l'inici de cada torn seu, the woe strider decides which way the cone faces and whether its mouth is open or closed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The woe strider fa dos atacs d'Urpa.and one bite attack. If both claws hit the same creature, l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar).

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one creature that is {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitat}, o {@condition restrained}. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic. A més, each magic item the creature is carrying that isn't an artifact has its magical properties suppressed durant 1 minut.
